testcase.name: Check the service PUT method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/responseUpdate.json') . passed * def requestBodyUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/requestBodyUpdate.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBodyUpdate ............................................. passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseUpdate ...................................... passed And assert response.id == requestBodyUpdate.id ............................ passed And assert response.name == requestBodyUpdate.name ........................ passed And assert response.category.id == requestBodyUpdate.category.id .......... passed And assert response.category.name == requestBodyUpdate.category.name ...... passed And assert response.tags.id == requestBodyUpdate.tags.id .................. passed And assert response.tags.name == requestBodyUpdate.tags.name .............. passed And assert response.status == requestBodyUpdate.status .................... passed
